Html:
Hi,

I'm using the last source code (5da227f4f098).
I saw that using OSM like GeocodingProvider and searching for Paris (just an exemple), the map is centering on ... Las Vegas.
Using Bing go to an exception "Google Maps Geocoder can't find: 'Paris', ...".
With GoogleMap like GeocodingProvider, show the right position.

We find the same behaviour in WindowsForm and WPF.

How can be fix it?

Thank you !
;} it's Paris casino, i guess you need to add more parameters to get 'real' city: "paris, france"

Yes, you are right.

Thank you !
or you can set GMapProviders.OpenStreetMap.MinExpectedRank = 0; // i'll make this by default
p.s. 'fixed' bing provider to automatically get client key or else you have to set it yourself manualy
